text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: Continuing on to the next segment, we have this! A spotlight on the Twinkle Series "Cool★Spot"!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: Soon the battle for the Classic races will begin, and for this year's participants, the number of people calling them the "Golden Generation" has been increasing!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: Among those gaining attention, outwardly with an aloof nature, but conversely, using her cunning escape to control the race, Seiun Sky!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: By crafting her own pace, she leads her opponents around by the nose, among her fans she's been given the title of "Trickster"!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: Continuing on, having achieved 3 consecutive wins, including a Major, without breaking a sweat is King Halo!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: The daughter of a reknowned family, living up to expectations, she's displayed a magnificent racing style! The number of G1 titles she'll obtain is already the talk of the town!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: Gallantly flying in from America, the way she snatches away victories is certainly like a condor! The as yet undefeated "Seabird" El Condor Pasa!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: "I'll prove I'm the world's strongest" are her words, and she's shown that she's not all talk! With her striking run at her debut match, she's gained a lot of fans!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: Also from America we have one more Uma Musume, Grass Wonder! While she appears to be a Yamato Nadeshiko, what lies within is certainly a samurai spirit!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: The undefeated Junior champion of the [Asahi Hai FS] with a record-breaking victory! With her overwhelming race presence, the title of "Monster" has been given to her!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: And the last one we'll introduce, carrying a big dream, coming to the capital all the way from Hokkaido, Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: She immediately demonstrated the abilities that brought her into Tracen Academy in her debut race! Possibly becoming a part of the "Golden Generation" has brought her a lot of attention!

text_block_list.name: Color Commentator
text_block_list.text: How will she do in her upcoming second race?! What kind of races will we become witness to?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'll be off- to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I LOOOOOST!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwooooo～h! It's frustrating isn't it～?! I understand, that bitter feeling～!
To become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― to live up to that dream, Special Week had come all the way to Tracen Academy.
After a complete victory in her debut race, she continued on to challenge her second race but, was narrowly defeated and placed second.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uuuu… Mom said she would be cheering me on as she watched on TV. That's why I gave it my all…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Even with that… I couldn't pull ahead～!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You did your best, didn't you～?! You were admirable, Spe-chaaaaan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Um, if you keep using such loud voices, you'll bother the people around us…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Even so, can you really say this result was unexpected? It felt like you were conserving your strength.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah… since it looked like training was really easy for you…
In practice, Spe's running ability is not bad. That's why I wanted her to enter the race after all.
Physical ability, particularly when it comes to clinching a race, Chikezo and Brian are top class, but I feel that she has the potential to match them.
When it comes to stamina, since she recovers quickly after the race is over, I think there will be no issues for longer distances.
When it comes to stamina, since she recovers quickly after the race is over, I think there will be no issues for longer distances.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: If there's an issue, it's probably experience.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Experience…?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Before coming to this academy, you had never run with another Uma Musume before, right? Running by yourself and running against multiple opponents in a race are completely different.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Don't expect a conveniently good course or to run at a comfortable pace. You need to learn how to crush your opponents on the spot.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: That's right! If you gain some experience, you'll be fine!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, you've only lost once so far～

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Spe, you have us as backup too! If you lose, we'll console you with everything we've got so, smash 'em to pieces!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …No, smashing them is a little…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But, everyone on the team being with you, is true.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, let's run together with everyone even more than before. If you don't have enough experience, then I'll be your practice partner as many times as you want.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san…! Everyone…!
Alright, starting today we'll put more focus on actual race experience! We know what we need to do, so there's no time to be looking down, Spe!
Alright, starting today we'll put more focus on actual race experience! We know what we need to do, so there's no time to be looking down, Spe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I can't run while looking down anyways!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The promise I made with mom, to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I'll show you I can do it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uooooooooooh～! Guuuuuuuutss～!!
As if to blow away all the feelings of being depressed about losing, Special Week went dashing down the course.
That form, she was unchanged from the time when I invited her to the team, a genuine and straight-forward runner.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Good work, Special Week-san. With this, today's menu is complete.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You did good overcoming this hard training session! As expected of me, I was right to put my trust in you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa… haaa… with everyone helping me this much, I felt I had to put in at least this much hard work…!
Just like this, let's continue to develop your race intuition. Alright, lets finish up with some cooldowns-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Um, Trainer-san. I want to do a little bit more training, so can I keep running?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey now, don't you think you're a little too enthusiastic?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… for some reason, I just feel really motivated!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You see… to tell the truth, I don't really know what I need to do to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume."

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: What do I need to do to proudly be able to tell my mom [I became Japan's #1]? I've been thinking about it this whole time, but I couldn't think of an answer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's true, "Japan's #1" is just an easy way to say it, but it can take many forms, such as having a great record or a notable achievement.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but just thinking about it won't get me anywhere so, for now I'll take it one step at a time and do my best at what I can!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And that's what I realized when I was running together with all of you! Probably, I'll get even closer to my goal of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: To start with, "A Triple Crown Uma Musume"!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's a huge goal, don't you think?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: [Satsuki Sho] then the [Derby], and finally [Kika Sho]… even winning just one Classic Race is a big deal…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: After winning the Triple Crown, all the interviews and things were a pain, though.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Of course they would! That's just how big of a deal it is!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: My aim is to become Japan's #1, so I have to be prepared to aim for something big like that! Because Hokkaido is Big-kaido!
A big achievement like the Triple Crown, is simple to link to being Japan's #1.
But, considering how big her dream is, I think it's a fine goal to focus on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course, with a goal that big, half-hearted training won't be sufficient.
Since Spe has decided on her goal, I just need to give her my full support. Let's do some additional training!
Since Spe has decided on her goal, I just need to give her my full support. Let's do some additional training!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll be off!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Things are heatin' up aren't they?! Hell yeah! I'll be taggin' along too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fufuu… I can certainly see why Trainer-san invited Special Week-san to join the team.
Even after having glimpsed the true intensity of a real race, Special Week still had an even more positive outlook than before.
Because she has such genuine feelings, it makes me strongly desire to support her dream.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: C'mon Spe! The road to the Triple Crown isn't so forgiving! Let's add 50 laps on the dirt course!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: 50 laps?! N-No waaaaay～!!
